FdoINetworkTSPCommand
SetNodeFeatures

virtual FDO_API void FdoINetworkTSPCommand::SetNodeFeatures (  GisString *  className,
FdoFilter *  filter
)  [pure virtual]
 

This method is used to set an optional filter that resolve to a set of nodes that is used for the traveling salesman analysis.

Parameters:
className is the class name used to set the context of the filter.
filter a filter that defines a group of nodes.
Returns:
Returns nothing
Comments or suggestions? Send us feedback.
